context_of_use: This use case allows users to view and download reports for analysis.
description: Allows users to view, download, and analyze general and sales reports.
postconditions: User successfully views and downloads reports.
assumptions: Users have valid accounts to access the reporting system.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to view reports.
The system shall allow users to download reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on report types available for viewing and downloading.
main_flow: 1. User requests to view reports → System prompts for authentication.
2. User provides authentication credentials → System verifies credentials.
3. User is authenticated → System displays available reports.
4. User selects a report to view → System presents the report details.
5. User chooses to download the report → System initiates the download.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If the user is not authenticated, the system redirects to the login page.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If authentication fails, the system displays an error message and prompts for re-entry of credentials.
